parameters.name: name
parameters.description: (string) Name of the provider in which to list shares.

parameters.name: max_results
parameters.description: Maximum number of shares to return.

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Opaque pagination token to go to next page based on previous query.

200.description: The provider shares list was successfully retrieved.

get.description: Gets an array of a specified provider's shares within the metastore where:
